1.text: Comb out any tangles using your fingers or a wide-toothed comb.

2.text: Soak up any excess moisture with a towel.
2.vid: /3/3d/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Consider letting your hair air dry part-way before you use a hairdryer.
3.vid: /4/4f/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Hold the hairdryer about 12 inches (30 cm) away from your hair to rough dry.

5.text: Point the nozzle downwards when you blow dry your hair.
5.vid: /0/0f/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Use your fingers to keep your hair smooth while your blow dry it.
6.vid: /c/c8/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Consider using a vented round brush to make your hair straight.
7.vid: /6/6c/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 7 Version 4.360p.mp4

8.text: Finish your look by giving your hair a blast of cool air.
8.vid: /b/b8/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Apply a leave-in conditioner to the ends of your hair.
9.vid: /9/9a/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Use a tiny bit of argan oil, jojoba oil, or shine serum on your hair before you blow dry it.
10.vid: /5/55/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Use a heat protection spray before your blow dry your hair.
11.vid: /f/f8/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Try getting a nozzle attachment for your hairdryer if you have straight hair.

13.text: Try getting a diffuser attachment for your hairdryer if you have curly hair.

15.text: Protect your hair from the elements.

16.text: Rinse hair with cold water to help cut down on frizz.

17.text: Consider sleeping on a satin pillowcase.

18.text: Try to get your hair trimmed every 6 to 8 weeks.
18.vid: /6/69/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 18 Version 3.360p.mp4

19.text: Don't shampoo your hair every day, especially if it is curly.

20.text: Choose appropriate hair products for your hair type.

21.vid: /3/36/Blow Dry Hair Without Frizz Step 21 Version 3.360p.mp4

22.text: Avoid heat styling if you can, and use a heat protection spray when you do.

23.text: Avoid products that contain silicones and sulfates.

24.text: Wash your hair with a clarifying shampoo once per month.

25.text: Limit alcohol, caffeine, smoking, and processed foods.

26.text: Limit the chemical treatments on your hair.
